description: Check your understanding of how Python sets store data and how to work with common operations.

questions.question: Which snippet creates an empty set named tags?
questions.explanation: `{}` creates an empty dictionary. The `set()` constructor is the canonical way to create an empty set.

questions.question: Which operator returns the symmetric difference between two sets a and b?
questions.explanation: The caret operator `^` returns items that appear in exactly one of the two sets.
